name: **Beach**
description: Beach S802-058 Sheet 76 A popular extensive beach 1km off the main street of Fethard, the local beach. Exposed to easterlies. Parking is on the roadside above the beach and is at a premium on hot days. Especially at LW the carry down the steep path and beach to the water can be gruelling. There are houses all along the roadway so do park considerately.
